attributes.action: Provide free school meals for every primary school child in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Food Poverty can have a serious impact on a child’s physical, social, emotional, and cognitive development which can negatively affect their future lives. Nutritional food is critical to a child's holistic development. Food insecurity is causing serious health issues for children and also placing strain on the NHS both now and throughout their life, therefore by providing a child with a nutritional meal can prevent long term health issues.
attributes.background: England continues to hold back universal support only to those up to year two or on benefits. Considering all the advantages of receiving a nutritional meal, universal free school meals should be rolled out to all primary school children in the UK

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Provide free school meals to all school children 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703256
